import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
def preprocess_data(df):
    # Drop irrelevant columns
    df = df.drop(columns=['Name', 'Ticket', 'Cabin'])
    
    # Fill missing values
    df['Age'].fillna(df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Fare'].fillna(df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Embarked'].fillna(df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)
    
    # Encode categorical variables
    categorical_features = ['Sex', 'Embarked']
    preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
        transformers=[
            ('num', StandardScaler(), ['Pclass', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare']),
            ('cat', OneHotEncoder(), categorical_features)
        ])
    
    X = preprocessor.fit_transform(df)
    return X

X_train = preprocess_data(train_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId', 'Survived']))
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Define pipeline
pipeline = Pipeline(steps=[
    ('preprocessor', ColumnTransformer(
        transformers=[
            ('num', StandardScaler(), ['Pclass', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare']),
            ('cat', OneHotEncoder(), ['Sex', 'Embarked'])
        ])),
    ('classifier', RandomForestClassifier())
])

# Hyperparameter tuning
param_grid = {
    'classifier__n_estimators': [100, 200, 300],
    'classifier__max_depth': [None, 10, 20, 30]
}
grid_search = GridSearchCV(pipeline, param_grid, cv=5, scoring='accuracy')
grid_search.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
X_test = preprocess_data(test_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId']))
predictions = grid_search.predict(X_test)

# Save submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({
    'PassengerId': test_df['PassengerI

import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
def preprocess_data(df):
    # Drop irrelevant columns
    df = df.drop(columns=['Name', 'Ticket', 'Cabin'])
    
    # Fill missing values
    df['Age'].fillna(df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Fare'].fillna(df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Embarked'].fillna(df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
def preprocess_data(df):
    # Drop irrelevant columns
    df = df.drop(columns=['Name', 'Ticket', 'Cabin'])
    
    # Fill missing values
    df['Age'].fillna(df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Fare'].fillna(df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Embarked'].fillna(df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)
    
    # Encode categorical variables
    categorical_features = ['Sex', 'Embarked']
    numerical_features = ['Pclass', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare']
    
    preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
        transformers=[
            ('num', StandardScaler(), numerical_features),
            ('cat', OneHotEncoder(sparse=False), categorical_features)
        ])
    
    X = preprocessor.fit_transform(df)
    X = pd.DataFrame(X, columns=preprocessor.named_transformers_['num'].get_feature_names_out(numerical_features) + preprocessor.named_transformers_['cat'].get_feature_names_out(categorical_features))
    return X

X_train = preprocess_data(train_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId', 'Survived']))
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Define pipeline
pipeline = Pipeline(steps=[
    ('preprocessor', ColumnTransformer(
        transformers=[
            ('num', StandardScaler(), ['Pclass', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare']),
            ('cat', OneHotEncoder(sparse=False), ['Sex', 'Embarked'])
        ])),
    ('classifier', RandomForestClassifier())
])

# Hyperparameter tuning
param_grid = {
    'classifier__n_estimators': [100, 200, 300],
    'classifier__max_depth': [None, 10, 20, 30]
}
grid_search = GridSearchCV(pipeline, param_gri

import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
def preprocess_data(df):
    print("Original DataFrame shape:", df.shape)
    
    # Drop irrelevant columns
    df = df.drop(columns=['Name', 'Ticket', 'Cabin'])
    print("After dropping irrelevant columns:", df.shape)
    
    # Fill missing values
    df['Age'].fillna(df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Fare'].fillna(df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
    df['Embarked'].fillna(df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)
    print("After filling missing values:", df.shape)
    
    # Encode categorical variables
    categorical_features = ['Sex', 'Embarked']
    numerical_features = ['Pclass', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare']
    
    preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
        transformers=[
            ('num', StandardScaler(), numerical_features),
            ('cat', OneHotEncoder(sparse=False), categorical_features)
        ])
    
    X = preprocessor.fit_transform(df)
    print("Transformed features shape:", X.shape)
    
    X = pd.DataFrame(X, columns=preprocessor.named_transformers_['num'].get_feature_names_out(numerical_features) + preprocessor.named_transformers_['cat'].get_feature_names_out(categorical_features))
    print("Final DataFrame shape:", X.shape)
    return X

print("X_train shape:", X_train.shape)
y_train = train_df['Survived']

from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, GridSearchCV
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier

        transformers=[
            ('num', StandardScaler(), numerical_features),

        ])

    return X
